text: Jack Herndon "Buddy" Brewer (April 21, 1918 – November 30, 2003) was a pitcher in Major League Baseball who played from 1944 through 1946 for the New York Giants. Listed at , , Brewer threw and batted right-handed. He attended University of Southern California. In a three-season career, Brewer posted a 9–10 record with 73 strikeouts and a 4.36 ERA in 43 appearances, including 28 starts, 10 complete games, and 216 innings of work. ==External links== Category:New York Giants (NL) players Category:Major League Baseball pitchers Category:USC Trojans baseball players Category:Baseball players from California Category:1918 births Category:2003 deaths
title: Jack Brewer (baseball)
